Hey! I am Daniele. I am a PhD student at **Ludwig-Maximilians-Universität München** and the **Helmholtz Munich** under the supervision of [Christian L. Müller](https://bio-datascience.github.io/).   

I am very interested in **statistics and machine learning**.
Much of my research involves using **statistics and machine learning** to understand **biological systems**. I particularly look into  subjects related to the interactions between **viruses and bacteria**, and **graphical models**. 

Here my main [project](projects.qmd) and [posters](publications.qmd#Posters)
